page.title: 06SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: The primary schools are about four miles away at{Gotherington}or{ {Ashchurch}and the secondary schools five miles away at{Tewkesbury}and {Bishop's Cleeve}.Children are transported to and from school which prohibits after school activities. The nearest cottage hospitals are at {Winchcombe}and{Tewkesbury,}six miles distant,and the major hospital at {Cheltenham},eight miles,where the doctors and dentists are also located. The loss of a resident policeman, with his local intimate knowledge,occurred during the last ten years.Concern is expressed over the absence of any local police surviellance,the nearest police station is some six to seven miles away.
